translations.translation: One of his followers in iman was Ibrahim
And Abraham indeed was of his inducement,
Abraham was on the self-same way (as Noah).
Abraham was one of his followers.
And indeed Ibrahim is from his (Nooh’s) group.
And verily, among those who followed his way was Ibrahim.
And most surely Ibrahim followed his way.
Of his party was also Abraham;
And lo! of his persuasion verily was Abraham
Abraham was of the same faith:
And verily of his sect was Ibrahim.
Indeed Abraham was among his followers,
Verily among those who followed his Way was Abraham.
And, verily, among those who followed his [Nuh's (Noah)] way (Islamic Monotheism) was Ibrahim (Abraham).
And indeed, among his kind was Abraham,

[37:83] And truly of his adherents, that is, of those who agreed with him on the fundaments of religion, was Abraham, despite the fact that there was a long interval between them, 2640 years, and between them came [the prophets] Hūd and Sālih.

511 (And lo! of his persuasion) of Noah's persuasion; and it is also said this means: of Muhammad's persuasion (verily was Abraham) He says: Abraham followed the religion and way of Noah and Muhammad (pbuh) followed Abraham's religion and way.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَإِنَّ مِن شِيعَتِهِ } أي: من جملة من شايعه في التوحيد والإيمان
 بل من أجله من تابعه على أصول الدين ومعالم اليقين { لإِبْرَاهِيمَ } [الصافات: 83] المتصف بكمال العلم والحلم والمعرفة واليقين وإن طال الزمان بينهما


قيل: كان بين نوح وإبراهيم - عليهم السلام - ألفان وستمائة وأربعونة سنة
